mapper.select: select userid , password , enabled , nickname from tb_user where userid = #{value}
select a.authority from tb_authorities a join tb_user b on(a.user_cd = b.user_cd) where b.userid = #{value}

select g.group_cd as id , g.group_name , ga.authority from tb_groups g join tb_group_member gm on (g.group_cd = gm.group_cd) join tb_group_authorities ga on (g.group_cd = ga.group_cd) join tb_user u on(gm.user_cd = u.user_cd) where u.userid = #{value}
